OK, for all posts including Lunarpine and Phobia.

Lunarpines setting the pod for flight when it's sudenly rocked with 
enemy fire. 
"slag we're hit.

(RebelYell exits ship to join battle)
"Slaggin ships losing power, I'm losing control." if the transport 
were to explode in that particular location all thier hard work on 
the repairs would have been wasted, he sets a course for the upper 
atmosphere where it would be less likely to do damage, once there he 
scanned the battlefield the battle was turning worse half the 
Maximals were down already and the other half were outgunned

He couldn't get an accurate reading on the whos who on the 
battlefield. he opened a commlink with no response, the battle had 
interupted the communications network.

The wolf knew that he was most likely the only bot who hadn't 
sustained damage so he set a course for the outer northernmost edge 
of the battlefield and began his descent back to Earth.


Phobias baby at the caves entrance signaled Megatrons return, KitKat 
was in no condition to challenge the tyrant so he hoped that nobody 
would spill the beans about the surprise the other preds had for 
Megatron. "Come on Kit just remain calm." Phobia pressed a button and 
the baby at the door desolved into a cinder.

He heard the discussion about the attack on the cybertronian Fire, it 
could work if given the right setup. 

OOC Oh well sorry so messed up but I'm having a brainfatr right now 
and need some sleep sleep
